page.title: 04Religion - Mattingley Area.
page.content: The hamlets of West Green, Phoenix Green & Dipley fall within the{Parish {of Hartley Wintney.}The rest of the block is in the{Parish of Heckfield {with Mattingley & Rotherwick.}There are Churches at each of these settle- ments but only one Rector. The C.15 {Mattingley Church}is the only church in the block & is used every 3rd week for{Holy Communion}at 08.30,{Morning {Service}at 10.30 &{Evensong}at 18.30. There is the ocasional wedding or funeral (there are a few spaces left in the Churchyard) & the usual Church Festivals. The half-timbered Church with its herring-bone brickwork is unique & is well maintained. As the Parish is so rural, the{Rector}visits his Parishioners & delivers the Parish magazine by bicycle.
